item.description:
Please RSVP!

TITLE: An evening of Market Discussion and Stockpicks

DESCRIPTION: As regular attendees of our meetings will attest, we prize open discussion. This meeting will have no invited speaker so that we can have an evening of extended discussion about whatever topic you wish to talk about. Experience tells us that members like these meetings most of all! There will be plenty of time for everyone to get their say and to ask their question.

This meeting's agenda will have the following agenda:
7:00 - Meeting Begins:
- Technical Analysis update by Harlan
- Stockpicks
- Open Discussion led by Jeff

If you have friends that you talk stocks with then bring them with you!

To join our online discussion go to
http://groups.google....
or send email to DouglasWRoberts@gmail.com.

Food or drinks are not allowed in any MIT meeting room.

This is a free meeting. There is no membership required.
item.name: Boston Investor's Business Daily Tuesday Meetup
